Class RideManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.RideManager

  • public class RideManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RideManager(Ride ride, MapGrid map, java.util.ArrayList<Driver> drivers, Passenger passenger, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> successfulRides, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cancelledRides)
      Constructor for a RideManager that initializes the private values and starts the ride.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void findNearestDriver()
      Finds the nearest driver to the current passenger's pickup location and then sorts the array of drivers from closest to furthest.
      void finishRide()
      Updates the balances of the passenger and the driver to subtract the drive fair from the passenger's balance and adding that amount to the driver's balance.
      double getFair(double driverDistance)
      Gets the fair for the current ride by calculating the distance between the passenger to driver and then the distance of the ride times the amount of the current rate
      void startRide()
      Starts the current ride by finding the nearest driver, finding the nearest fair, validating the passenger can pay the fair, setting the status of the driver as they make their way to the passenger, and calling the startTransit function
      void startTransit()
      Sets the status of the driver while the ride starts and makes it to the destination, then updates the driver and passenger locations to the destination upon arrival.
      boolean validateFair(double fair)
      Validates that the current passenger has enough money in their account to pay for the total fair of the ride.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RideManager

        public RideManager(Ride ride,
                   MapGrid map,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Driver> drivers,
                   Passenger passenger,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> successfulRides,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cancelledRides)
        Constructor for a RideManager that initializes the private values and starts the ride.
        Parameters:
        ride - Ride object that specifies current ride
        map - MapGrid object to specify the current mapGrid
        drivers - ArrayList of all Drivers on the mapGrid
        passenger - Passenger object of the current passenger requesting a ride
        successfulRides - ArrayList of Strings representing the Passengers with successful rides
        cancelledRides - ArrayList of Strings representing the Passengers with cancelled rides
        -

    • Method Detail

      • findNearestDriver

        public void findNearestDriver()
        Finds the nearest driver to the current passenger's pickup location and then sorts the array of drivers from closest to furthest. If there is a tie for the closest drivers, it goes with the driver with the highest rating

      • getFair

        public double getFair(double driverDistance)
        Gets the fair for the current ride by calculating the distance between the passenger to driver and then the distance of the ride times the amount of the current rate
        Parameters:
        driverDistance - double that specifies the distance from the driver to the passenger
        Returns:
        double that specifies the fair for the current ride

      • validateFair

        public boolean validateFair(double fair)
        Validates that the current passenger has enough money in their account to pay for the total fair of the ride. If not, it cancels the ride and notifies the passenger.
        Parameters:
        fair - double that indicates the total fair for the upcoming ride
        Returns:
        boolean true if the user has enough money to cover the fair, false if they do not

      • startRide

        public void startRide()
        Starts the current ride by finding the nearest driver, finding the nearest fair, validating the passenger can pay the fair, setting the status of the driver as they make their way to the passenger, and calling the startTransit function

      • startTransit

        public void startTransit()
        Sets the status of the driver while the ride starts and makes it to the destination, then updates the driver and passenger locations to the destination upon arrival. Then calls the finishRide function.

      • finishRide

        public void finishRide()
        Updates the balances of the passenger and the driver to subtract the drive fair from the passenger's balance and adding that amount to the driver's balance. Then chooses a rating randomly for the passenger to give to the driver between 1 and 5, then applies the new rating to the driver's overall rating and sets the status of the driver to available, then adds the passenger to the list of successful rides.
